017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.util.Collection;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.Objects;
022
023import org.microbean.development.annotation.OverridingEncouraged;
024
025/**
026 * An interface whose implementations represent a Java type or a Java
027 * {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} for equality
028 * comparison purposes and no other.
029 *
030 * @param <T> the type describing the type representation type
031 *
032 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
033 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
034 */
035public interface Owner<T> {
036
037  /**
038   * Returns the {@link Owner} of this {@link Owner}, or {@code null}
039   * if there is no such {@link Owner}.
040   *
041   * @return the {@link Owner} of this {@link Owner}, or {@code null}
042   *
043   * @nullability Implementations of this method may, and often will,
044   * return {@code null}.
045   *
046   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
047   * and deterministic.
048   *
049   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
050   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
051   */
052  public Owner<T> owner();
053
054  /**
055   * Returns the object this {@link Owner} is modeling, or {@code
056   * null} if that information is not supplied by the implementation.
057   *
058   * @return the object this {@link Owner} is modeling, or {@code
059   * null} if that information is not supplied by the implementation
060   *
061   * @nullability Implementations of this method may return {@code
062   * null}.
063   *
064   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
065   * and deterministic.
066   *
067   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
068   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
069   */
070  @OverridingEncouraged
071  public default Object object() {
072    return null;
073  }
074
075  /**
076   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
077   * either a Java type that has a name, or an {@linkplain
078   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable}.
079   *
080   * <p>In the Java reflective type system, only {@link Class}, {@link
081   * java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable}, and {@link
082   * java.lang.reflect.Executable} instances have names.</p>
083   *
084   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
085   * either a Java type that has a name, or an {@linkplain
086   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable}
087   *
088   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
089   * and deterministic.
090   *
091   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
092   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
093   *
094   * @see #name()
095   *
096   * @see Class#getName()
097   *
098   * @see java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable#getName()
099   */
100  @OverridingEncouraged
101  public default boolean named() {
102    return this.name() != null;
103  }
104
105  /**
106   * Returns the name of this {@link Owner} if it has one <strong>or
107   * {@code null} if it does not</strong>.
108   *
109   * <p>Only classes and type variables in the Java reflective type
110   * system have names.  {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Executable
111   * Owners representing executables} do too.</p>
112   *
113   * @return the name of this {@link Owner}, or {@code null}
114   *
115   * @nullability Implementations of this method may, and often will,
116   * return {@code null}.
117   *
118   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
119   * and deterministic.
120   *
121   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
122   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
123   */
124  public String name();
125
126  /**
127   * If this {@link Owner} represents a parameterized type or a
128   * generic array type, returns a {@link Type} representing its raw
129   * type or generic component type, or, if this {@link Owner}
130   * represents an {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Constructor
131   * constructor}, returns a {@link Type} representing {@code void} or
132   * {@link Void}, or, if this {@link Owner} represents a {@linkplain
133   * java.lang.reflect.Method method}, returns a {@link Type}
134   * representing its {@linkplain
135   * java.lang.reflect.Method#getGenericReturnType() generic return
136   * type}, or returns {@code this} (the {@link Owner} in this case
137   * will be known to be a {@link Type}).
138   *
139   * <p>Undefined behavior will result if an implementation does not
140   * meet these requirements.</p>
141   *
142   * @return a suitable {@link Type}; never {@code null}; often {@code
143   * this}
144   *
145   * @nullability Implementations of this method must not return
146   * {@code null}.
147   *
148   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
149   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
150   *
151   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
152   * and deterministic.
153   */
154  public Type<T> type();
155
156  /**
157   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
158   * an {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} by virtue
159   * of having parameters.
160   *
161   * <p>This implementation calls the {@link #parameters()} method and
162   * returns {@code true} if the resulting {@link List} is not {@code
163   * null} and {@linkplain List#isEmpty() is not empty}.  Subclasses
164   * are encouraged to provide a faster implementation.</p>
165   *
166   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
167   * an {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} by virtue
168   * of having parameters
169   *
170   * @see #parameters()
171   */
172  @OverridingEncouraged
173  public default boolean hasParameters() {
174    final Collection<?> p = this.parameters();
175    return p != null && !p.isEmpty();
176  }
177
178  /**
179   * Returns an {@linkplain
180   * java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList(List) unmodifiable
181   * <code>List</code>} of this {@link Owner}'s parameters, if this
182   * {@link Owner} represents an {@linkplain
183   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable}, or {@code null} if it
184   * does not.
185   *
186   * @return an {@linkplain
187   * java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList(List) unmodifiable
188   * <code>List</code>} of this {@link Owner}'s parameters, if this
189   * {@link Owner} represents an {@linkplain
190   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable}, or {@code null} if it
191   * does not
192   *
193   * @nullability Implementations of this method may, and often will,
194   * return {@code null}.
195   *
196   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
197   * and deterministic.
198   *
199   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
200   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
201   */
202  public List<? extends Type<T>> parameters();
203
204  /**
205   * Returns {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
206   * a generic class or a generic {@linkplain
207   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} by virtue of having type
208   * parameters.
209   *
210   * <p>This implementation calls the {@link #typeParameters()} method
211   * and returns {@code true} if the resulting {@link List} is not
212   * {@code null} and {@linkplain List#isEmpty() not empty}.
213   * Subclasses are encouraged to provide a faster implementation.</p>
214   *
215   * @return {@code true} if and only if this {@link Owner} represents
216   * a generic class or a generic {@linkplain
217   * java.lang.reflect.Executable executable} by virtue of having type
218   * parameters
219   *
220   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
221   * and deterministic.
222   *
223   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
224   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
225   *
226   * @see #typeParameters()
227   */
228  @OverridingEncouraged
229  public default boolean hasTypeParameters() {
230    final Collection<?> tps = this.typeParameters();
231    return tps != null && !tps.isEmpty();
232  }
233
234  /**
235   * Returns an {@linkplain
236   * java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList(List) unmodifiable
237   * <code>List</code>} of this {@link Owner}'s type parameters.
238   *
239   * <p>The returned {@link List} will be {@linkplain List#isEmpty()
240   * non-empty} if and only if this {@link Type} models a generic
241   * class or a generic {@linkplain java.lang.reflect.Executable
242   * executable}.</p>
243   *
244   * <p>Undefined behavior will result if an implementation does not
245   * meet these requirements.</p>
246   *
247   * @return an {@linkplain
248   * java.util.Collections#unmodifiableList(List) unmodifiable
249   * <code>List</code>} of this {@link Type}'s type parameters; never
250   * {@code null}
251   *
252   * @nullability Implementations of this method must not return
253   * {@code null}.
254   *
255   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
256   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
257   *
258   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
259   * and deterministic.
260   */
261  public List<? extends Type<T>> typeParameters();
262
263  /**
264   * Returns {@code true} if this {@link Owner} represents the same
265   * thing as that represented by the supplied {@link Owner}.
266   *
267   * <p>Representation is not the same thing as equality.
268   * Specifically, an {@link Owner} may represent another {@link Owner}
269   * exactly, but may not be {@linkplain Object#equals(Object) equal to}
270   * it.</p>
271   *
272   * <p>Equality is <em>subordinate</em> to type representation.  That
273   * is, in determining whether a given {@link Owner} represents
274   * another {@link Owner}, their {@link Object#equals(Object)
275   * equals(Object)} methods may be called, but an {@link Owner}'s
276   * {@link Object#equals(Object) equals(Object)} method must not call
277   * {@link #represents(Owner)}.</p>
278   *
279   * @param <X> the type representation type used by the supplied
280   * {@link Owner}
281   *
282   * @param other the {@link Owner} to test; may be {@code null} in
283   * which case {@code false} will be returned
284   *
285   * @return {@code true} if this {@link Owner} represents the same
286   * thing as that represented by the supplied {@link Owner}
287   *
288   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
289   * and deterministic.
290   *
291   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
292   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
293   */
294  @OverridingEncouraged
295  public default <X> boolean represents(final Owner<X> other) {
296    if (other == this) {
297      return true;
298    } else if (other != null && (this.equals(other) || Objects.equals(this.object(), other.object()))) {
299      return true;
300    } else {
301      return false;
302    }
303  }
304
305}
